question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. traffic lights
B. red truck
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The red truck is in the immediate foreground, directly ahead of the camera's viewpoint, while the traffic lights are mounted on a pole further down the road, clearly in the background.
